about.summary: Initializes the Unidata's NetCDF Java Library that implements the full CDM model, including all other .jar dependencies.
Initializes the Unidata's NetCDF Java Library that implements the full CDM model, including all other .jar dependencies.

name: r-loader.java
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-loader.java
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/loadeR.java/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2df0943d82505c85c6ea8c9e8bbe8e00617992f6710839456d42f1f59f0a8afd

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}git
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava
    - netcdf-java
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rjava
    - netcdf-java

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('loadeR.java')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('loadeR.java')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/loadeR.java
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Initializes the Unidata's NetCDF Java Library that implements the full CDM model, including all other .jar dependencies.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - cofinoa
    - mor427unican


# Package: loadeR.java
# Depends: rJava, R(>= 3.1.0)
# Type: Package
# Title: Loader of the NetCDF Java Library in R
# Version: 1.1.1
# Date: 2018-04-26
# Authors@R: as.person(c( "Santander Meteorology Group <http://meteo.unican.es> [cph]", "Joaquin Bedia <bediaj@unican.es> [aut, cre]", "Antonio Cofino <antonio.cofino@unican.es> [aut]", "Max Tuni <max@predictia.es> [ctb]", "Manuel Vega <manuel.vega@unican.es> [ctb]" ))
# Maintainer: Joaquin Bedia <bediaj@unican.es>
# BugReports: https://github.com/SantanderMetGroup/loadeR.java/issues
# Description: Initializes the Unidata's NetCDF Java Library that implements the full CDM model, including all other .jar dependencies.
# License: GPL(>=3) + file LICENSE
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
